gw.plugin.lookup

Interface Lookupable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface Lookupable
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Lookupable plugin is an interface for defining lookup methods which can be used in BizRule or any other Apps. Lookup is a named function that takes one ore more inputs and return a single valued object LookupColumn.

    Lookup Providers should implement Lookupable interface and create a LookupPlugin for their implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LookupColumn execute(java.lang.String tableID, java.util.List<LookupColumn> parameters, LookupMetaColumn valueDefinition)
      Executes the lookup with given input and output parameters and returns the Lookup output as a LookupColumn
      java.util.List<LookupMetadata> listRegisteredLookups() 

    • Method Detail

      • listRegisteredLookups

        java.util.List<LookupMetadata> listRegisteredLookups()
        Returns:
        registered lookups metadata information

      • execute

        LookupColumn execute(java.lang.String tableID,
                     java.util.List<LookupColumn> parameters,
                     LookupMetaColumn valueDefinition)
        Executes the lookup with given input and output parameters and returns the Lookup output as a LookupColumn
        Parameters:
        tableID - LookupTable or Lookup Function ID
        parameters - input parameters for Lookup functions
        valueDefinition - Lookup function output value definition
        Returns:
        Lookup function value
